snippet: Savannah State received payments totaling $860,000, about 17 percent of its athletic budget, for a 55-0 loss to Florida State and an 84-0 loss to Oklahoma State.
lead_paragraph: Savannah State received payments totaling $860,000, about 17 percent of its athletic budget, for a 55-0 loss to Florida State and an 84-0 loss to Oklahoma State.

headline.seo: For Savannah State, a 55-0 Defeat Served Its Purpose
headline.main: For Savannah State, a 55-0 Defeat Served Its Purpose
headline.print_headline: For Savannah State, a 55-0 Defeat Served Its Purpose
